p.d: : Clearing the decks Valérie finally agrees to accept a little chaos and chance in her life. She goes to live in the humble apartment she rented on a whim. Her friends and family disapprove, boycotting the housewarming party. Meanwhile, Simon's wife Josiane decides it's time to meet her rival... Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 1, Canada, 2016) Screenplay: Isabelle Langlois Cast: Sophie Cadieux (Valérie), Antoine Archambault (Thomas), Sylvie Léonard (Madeleine), Simon Lacroix (Éric), Éric Paulhus (Kevin), Éric Bernier (Stéphane), Jean-MoIse Martin (Simon), Olivia Palacci (Genevieve), Christine Beaulieu (Josiane) Genre: comedy drama
